divs: Sighting DetailsThese ships are found in the bible.The ones n the ships or angels,PSALMS 91,v.11,which reads "He shall give angels charge over you"These go undetected by technology that makes thier ships invisible.Look up invisibility on the computer.It will tell you how to make objects invisible.Look up teleportation.It is done by changing the magnetic field around a object.Look up a book called the MAKERS DIET by Jordan S. Rubin.Jordan was healed by theses over him.
